scheduling_templates.name: London Meeting - In Person
scheduling_templates.use_when: Decent-sized brand, PE firm, adviser, or high-value contact

scheduling_templates.name: Phone Call - Remote
scheduling_templates.use_when: Smaller brand, initial outreach, or below threshold for in-person

scheduling_templates.name: Follow Up - Post Meeting
scheduling_templates.use_when: After an initial meeting to recap and set next steps

scheduling_templates.name: NDA Exchange
scheduling_templates.use_when: When an NDA needs to be exchanged before sharing information

scheduling_templates.name: Information Pack
scheduling_templates.use_when: Sending detailed information after NDA is signed
